docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Friday AN ORTON BLACK COMEDY

docs.snippet: LEAD: By an eight-vote margin, the House has given a deserved rebuke to President Reagan's failed policy toward Central America. The majority told Mr. Reagan, in effect, that they and the people they represent believe he has been pursuing a war wi...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: By an eight-vote margin, the House has given a deserved rebuke to President Reagan's failed policy toward Central America. The majority told Mr. Reagan, in effect, that they and the people they represent believe he has been pursuing a war without end in Nicaragua, not peace. Accordingly, the legislators disapproved the Administration's plan for renewed aid to the contras.

headline.main: Ortega Says Contra Aid Rebuff Won't Stop U.S. 'War Against Nicaragua'

docs.snippet: LEAD: A Federal licensing board today rejected the Long Island Lighting Company's evacuation plan for the Shoreham nuclear power plant. The board said the plan was ''fundamentally flawed'' and might be inherently unworkable....
